record.description: Peter J. Chamales, as Irene the gold-digging co-ed who has designs on Bill, the University of Chicago president's son, played by Rob Roy McGregor in the Blackfriars musical comedy, "The House That Jack Built." The play is about two dissatisfied undergraduates who marry heiresses and buy the university to give it a business administration. Juniors George Morgenstern and Milton Mayer wrote it, and Bartlett Cormack, author of "The Racket," directed," The play will be presented at Mandel Hall, May 18, 19, 25, and 26.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
